sentence: Trump seized upon the Special Counsel’s filing” to call the scandal “far greater in scope and magnitude than Watergate.” Rep. Jim Jordan soon “endorsed Mr. Trump’s position,” Sussmann also complained.
author: Margot Cleveland
title: What We Learned From Michael Sussmann’s Response To The Spygate Special Counsel

sentence: When Jim Jordan [U.S. Rep for Ohio-R] and myself said that they were spying on his campaign, we were ridiculed.

sentence: According to the New York Post, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, speaking on Durham's investigation, found credibility in the probe's allegation of spying.
title: New Video: Devin Nunes Says Durham Probing 'Scam Of The Century'
